title: When both your sisters get a boyfriend
body:
And they have the same name

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/d1/d1596232856e39ad3f43c2bad2fa847bc02e817f0b149481e7c547e4344cb27d.jpg



_I'd like to be able to enter my kitchen freely at some point during the day_

replies.body: Start dating someone with one of your sister's names to one up them.  You must win the awkward war!

But that means I need to talk to other people I don't know

**_Internal screaming_**
I feel you on that one, just remember its for the joke and carry on!  lol
http://cdn.edgecast.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/avatars/44/44a1e13d5fafbf65f9e5bacaed117dc13fb0ff61_full.jpg
has to be someone who has the sister's name as well as that person having a brother with one of the sisters boyfriends name.
But the sisters' boyfriends both have the same name, so then there'd be three dudes with the same name, two girls too (unless his sisters are weird and have the same name too XD).

exactly.

3awkward5me

And then start finishing each others sentences 

{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
post pictures of your sisters
For science?
yah, that
Go to city hall, change your name to the same name as the dudes'. Both your sisters will wanna date you and dump them. Peace and quiet.

Lol, yeah, I have three sisters, two of them already have boyfriends with the same name - Michal.
We are waiting for the third to get one such too (she does have a friend with the name, though he seems like gay) and they are waiting for me to get girlfriend named Michaela.
Little do they know I am gay and can troll them by bringing fourth boyfriend named Michal.

Why not spice things up, bring the girl, say 
"she's a friend of mine."
Then have your boyfriend come around the corner, you two smooch on the cheek and you go
"And this is my **boyfriend**."

I have two sisters that both married guys that have the same name as me. 
Those are fun moments during the holidays.

my condolences my good man

In that situation I'd probably just overall ignore most times my name is called until it's made very clear who the person is talking to.
Wait is this some incest joke? DAMN.

That's one way to look at it.
The wrong way {{champion:164}}
Well, on the upside: You only need to remember one distinct name.
Now I can always identify who is in my kitchen, disabling my ability to enter such a room!
